title.rendered: Andrew Attends Davines Colour Ambassador Course

content.rendered:
Last week Management Stylist Andrew attended the annual Davines Colour Ambassador Course, run by celebrity stylist Brian Suhr.

Surrounded by creative talents in the industry, Andrew learnt upcoming and on-trend colouring techniques and let his creativity flare.

Book in a colour appointment with Andrew, and revamp your look this season with the latest colours and techniques

View Andrew’s Portfolio
